actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Corps of Engineers in performing certain emergency repairs and restoration of flood control works to make improvements which provide a higher level of flood protection.

summary.text: Amends the Flood Control Act of 1941 to authorize the Chief of Engineers, in carrying out any repair or restoration of flood control works threatened or destroyed by flood, to improve such flood control work in order to provide a higher level of flood control protection or to provide flood control protection to a larger area, if it is determined that such improvement will result in lower future costs to the United States for repair and restoration of such flood control work.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Corps of Engineers in performing certain emergency repairs and restoration of flood control works to make improvements which provide a higher level of flood protection.
